fields.text: Right now, how acceptable is the thermal environment at your workspace?
fields.name: ThermalAcceptability
fields.choices: ["Not at all acceptable", "Just unacceptable", "Just acceptable", "Very acceptable"]

fields.text: You feel:
fields.name: ThermalSensation

fields.text: You would prefer to be:
fields.name: ThermalPreference

fields.text: Right now, how acceptable is the air movement at your workspace?
fields.name: AirMovementAcceptability
fields.choices: ["Not at all acceptable", "Just unacceptable", "Just acceptable", "Very acceptable"]

fields.text: The air movement feels:
fields.name: AirMovementSensation

fields.text: You would prefer:
fields.name: AirMovementPreference

fields.text: Right now, how acceptable is the air quality at your workspace?
fields.name: AirQualityAcceptability
fields.choices: ["Not at all acceptable", "Just unacceptable", "Just acceptable", "Very acceptable"]

fields.text: Current cooling status of your heated/cooled chair:
fields.name: PCSChairCoolingStatus

fields.text: Current heating status of your heated/cooled chair:
fields.name: PCSChairHeatingStatus

fields.text: Current status of your personal fan:
fields.name: PCSFanStatus

fields.text: Current status of your footwarmer/legwarmer (if you have one):
fields.name: PCSFootwarmerStatus

fields.text: Please enter any general comments you have below.
fields.name: GeneralComments

fields.text: Please enter any comments you have about your Personal Comfort System (chair, footwarmer, or personal fan).
fields.name: PCSComments

fields.text: Please select your clothing ensemble:
fields.name: SpecialClothingLevel

fields.text: Rate your acceptance of air movement at your ankles.
fields.name: LabAirMovementAcceptabilityAnkles

fields.text: How acceptable is the temperature of your ankles?

fields.name: LabThermalAcceptabilityHands

fields.text: How acceptable is the temperature of your torso?
fields.name: LabThermalAcceptabilityTorso

fields.text: How acceptable is the temperature of your feet?
fields.name: LabThermalAcceptabilityFeet

fields.text: Rate your acceptance of the current thermal environment.
fields.name: LabThermalAcceptability

fields.text: Rate your current thermal sensation.
fields.name: LabThermalSensation

fields.text: Rate your thermal sensation for your ankles.
fields.name: LabThermalSensationAnkles

fields.text: Rate your thermal sensation for your feet.
fields.name: LabThermalSensationFeet

fields.text: Rate your thermal sensation for your hands.
fields.name: LabThermalSensationHands

fields.text: Rate your thermal sensation for your torso.
fields.name: LabThermalSensationTorso

fields.text: Rate your thermal sensation for your head.
fields.name: LabThermalSensationHead

fields.text: Rate your current thermal comfort.
fields.name: LabThermalComfortAcceptability

fields.text: Are you comfortable with your environment now?
fields.name: LabComfortableNow

fields.text: If you are not comfortable, what would you most likely do to feel better?
fields.name: LabImprovementMeasures
fields.choices: ["Adjust your clothing", "Open or close windows", "Adjust the thermostat", "Use personal fan", "Use personal heater", "Move to a different workstation", "Complain to building manager"]

fields.text: How acceptable is the temperature of your head?
fields.name: LabThermalAcceptabilityHead
